topic.title: Root content.json "signers"  field as a list
topic.body: Changed this assignment to have the "signers" field in root's content.json as a list and not as a dictionary to mantain uniformity with "includes" "signers" field and for not having a dict with empty values.

1604065824_mirrored_MRoci_github.body: @HelloZeroNet any update on this issue? Is it correct what i've done or i've misunderstood the assignement?
Thank you, i've seen this issue because if you try to add  multiple addresses to the signers filed it lets you sign the root content.json with different addresses.

1604067608_mirrored_ZeroNetTickBot_githu.body:
> I only did 1 trivial commit so I don't think I should have a say. I am just commenting so you can cross me off.

+1
